title: 5 New champs and race
body:
So these champs are going to be based around elvish like creatures and will be from the mystic islands, a new grouping of islands so lol can have a new race to play with. The 5 champs will be in each role so can have a whole team.

ADC

Elladan: the silent walker 

Passive: light steps

When ever elladan moves to different terrain he gets bonus movement speed (so if he enters a bush or walks on river) this this passive can stack 3 times but can not use the same terrain to stack.    

Q: silent blades

When activated the next 3 basic attacks are empowered and silence the enemy for a .5 of a second

W: Quick daggers

when activated elladan gains attack speed form a certain amount of time.
passive every 3rd hit on a single target slows them if hit 9 times applies a small stun

E: Throwing daggers

Elladan throws his daggers in a skill shot, damaging all it passes through at the end of the daggers flight increased damage where it lands. 

R: Bulls Eye

When activated Elladan gains 100% crit chance for the next 3 seconds  

Support

Idril: The wind whisperer 

Passive:I hear Whispers

Idril can hear whispers on the wind when an enemy champ has been missing for a set amount of time reveal their location for a brief moment (long cool down)

Q: The wind doesn't Lie

Idril sets up a invisible wind wall which slows enemies marks them and shows locations for 5 seconds. Size of wall increases with level 

W: Wind trail 

Idril sents out a gust of wind in a W shape damaging enemies and giving movement speed boost to allies while in one the trails.

E: Wind Tracker

When activated Idril procks her mark on any enemy effect a small wind trail heads towards them and increased damage is done to them for a small amount of time and increased movement speed towards them.  

R: Blinding Wind

Idril uses a skill shot to blow up dust and transform the landscape briefly any enemy caught in the gust is damaged, blinded and slowed (can be used to give elladan his passive)

MId

Yavanna: Mistress of the water

Passive: Water is in my blood
When damaged leave behind a small pool of water, if left for 5 seconds becomes a healing pool of water. If enemy champs steps on it will slow 

Q: Water of life

Yavanna sets up a small pool of water, if an enemy steps on it slows them and steals health from them, Yavanna then can recall it and heal her self 

W: A little bit of water can't hurt you

Yavanna sents her water out like darts in a straight line causing damage to targets hit (increased to champs effected by slows)

E: A lot of water can 

Yavanna sends out a pool of water in an aoe area, if an enemy is caught in it after a set time will stun them, while trapped in this pool does damage over time and does extra damage when stunned.   

R: Whirlpool

Yavanna collects all the water she has out and sucks all enemies in to her whirl pool which pulls them to the center of pool knocks ups and stuns.


Jungle 

 Haldir: 

Passive: Brothers in arms

When playing with Voronwe, when in range of each other their will to fight grows and both gain a small shield and a small increase to attack rang.

Q: Falling wood

Haldir uses his staff to do damage in a small aoe circle and outline of the staff which also knocks things up in at the end of his staff, but increased damage on the outline of the staff.

W: I need my staff

Haldir spins his staff 3 times does  more damage each rotation 

E: knock out blow

Haldir turns his staff to diamond and stuns enemy hit
passive every 3rd hit increases his attack speed for a short amount of time stacks 5 times

R: I can take them

Haldir selects an enemy and swaps places with him (like old urgot ult) the swap gives Haldir bonus armor and MR for 3 seconds
passive if playing with Voronwe when haldir swaps places also causes a fear in aoe circle fear last 1.5 seconds.  


Top

Voronwe: guarding of the mystic island 

Passive: Brotherly rival 

When playing with Haldir, when in range of each other. their brotherly rivalry comes out and both try to out do each other. gain small amount of mr and armor. 

Q: That's a big sword

Voronwe Brings his huge sword crashing down dealing damage in a V shape and slowing anything hit
passive: voronwe sword alerts him to danger his sword glows when an enemy is close by

W: I don't need a sword

Voronwe throws his sword up in the air and when it lands he gets a boost of attack speed and movement speed but attack range is lowered as he is now using his fist to attack. the sword landing gives aoe damage 

E: Tough conditioning 

For 7 Seconds gain increased mr amor and health depending on the amount of enemys near him
passive: for every 10 minions killed gain 5 permanent health.  

R: I'll Sort this out

Voronwe uses his sword to make 4 V shape attacks coming off him in all 4 directions. The V in front and back will stun enemies for 2 seconds.The 2 to his sides will slow enemies for 2 seconds.

passive if Haldir is with him all 4 V's are stuns

replies.body: More champs the better I guess
